links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (11,-55,165,-330,462,-462,330,-165,55,-11,1)
formula: Number of 16-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 6 contiguous pairs; g.f. 42*(2+3x)*x^3/(1-x)^11a(n) = C(n+1, 4)*C(n+6, 6) - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 08 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 13 2016
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
